document.full_text: two brothers are suing the fox television network for libel after the network allegedly linked them to a third brother, whom authorities have accused of working for al qaeda.
document.title: two brothers accuse fox network of libel over al qaeda link
lines_and_colors: two brothers are suing the fox television network for libel after the network allegedly linked them to a third brother, whom authorities have accused of working for al qaeda.
